subject: Cybersecurity
title: Behavioral Biometrics: How You Type Reveals Who You Are
description: A quick win: understand Behavioral Biometrics: How You Type Reveals Who You Are.

hook.text: You don't type like anyone else. The rhythm, pressure, and speed of your keystrokes form a unique signature.

buildup.text: Behavioral biometrics analyze typing patterns, mouse movements, gait, and touchscreen gestures to identify.

discovery.text: Unlike passwords checked once at login, behavioral biometrics verify identity continuously throughout all session.

twist.text: During WWII, telegraph operators were identified by their 'fist' â€“ their unique Morse code rhythm..

climax.text: Behavioral biometrics can detect account takeover mid-session: if typing patterns change, the user may have changed too.

punchline.text: WWII operators were identified by their tapping rhythm. Same idea.

quiz.question: What advantage do behavioral biometrics have over traditional authentication?
options: They verify identity continuously throughout a session, not just at login
